Name: 猟奇リスナー ～ 狙われた姫配信者 ～ Lunatic Viewer - Streamer Girl at Risk -
About the game: 'Lunatic Viewer - Streamer Girl at Risk' is a visual novel game about a reclusive protagonist who is fascinated by female streamers and gradually becomes interested in the streamer's private life. A 'Bishoujo' game released in 2018 by 'Noirsoft' for the 'CS Novels' platform, the game has been remade so that audiences of all ages from around the world can enjoy this stunning visual novel. ◆Introduction 'Kei... I hope you feel better after watching my live stream ♪' At that moment, I could see a light at the end of the tunnel. It started as a comfortable place for a wounded heart, but gradually, distorted desires began to show themselves, including a strong interest in the private lives of these streamer girls. At last, the protagonist has determined the address of these live streamers... but what will his next move be? ◆Synopsis Keisuke Oshida who became a recluse after being bullied spends his days on the internet. One day, he stumbles upon the live stream of a 'Streamer Girl'. Pleasently surprised at this world which he's never known before, Keisuke is determined to meet the streamer girls in real life. By using information from their live stream and SNS posts, he was able to determine the location of their homes. He decided to surprise these unknowing streamer girls during their live stream... ◆Characters ・Misaki Tokura 'She is a conservative and shy female student who has troubles saying no to requests. She finds pleasure in being pampered on live streaming sites' 'She is the first ''Princess'' that Keisuke has ever encountered. ''Kei, I'm so happy to meet you! I hope you feel better watching my live stream ♪''' ・Mari Hayashida 'She is the one who bullied Keisuke at school and is one of the most popular member of their class. Her pretentious personality causes her to hurt others, but she could no longer turn back even after realizing this.' 'She is a popular live streamer in the live broadcasting community where Keisuke finally found a place to relax. 'Thank you for watching! It's your first time, right?♪ My name is Lianne' ・Hitomi Uemura A college student who lives alone. She always wears a butterfly mask to hide her face while doing her outrageous live streams. She is majoring in psychology, and although she uses her live stream to gather data, she has become captivated by the experience. 'A fanatic streamer girl who treats the protagonist and other listeners as servants. 'You're just like they say aren't you? Kei, you're such a boring man... and for that I will have to punish you.' ・Keisuke Oshida The protagonist of this story. He became a recluse after being bullied at school. His online alias is 'Kei'. Although he is easily bullied, he has a strong personality online and enjoys interacting with various streamer girls during their live broadcasts.
